Class TallyingAuthority

java.lang.Object
core.TallyingAuthority
public class TallyingAuthority extends Object
Represents the Tallying Authority in the e-voting system.

This class is responsible for:

  • Decrypting and tallying votes after the election concludes
  • Implementing key sharing for threshold cryptography
  • Publishing election results

The Tallying Authority uses a secret sharing scheme (Shamir's Secret Sharing) to split its private key into multiple shares, requiring a threshold number of shares to reconstruct the key for vote decryption.

    • TallyingAuthority

      public TallyingAuthority() throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructs a new Tallying Authority with RSA key pair.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the RSA algorithm is not available

  • Method Details

    • splitKey

      public void splitKey(int n, int k)
      Splits the private key into multiple shares using Shamir's Secret Sharing.

      This implements a threshold cryptography scheme were at least 'k' out of 'n' shares are required to reconstruct the private key.

      Parameters:
      n - The total number of shares to create
      k - The threshold number of shares required for reconstruction
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If n is less than k

    • decryptAndTallyVotes

      public void decryptAndTallyVotes(List<byte[]> encryptedVotes, List<KeyShare> shares)
      Decrypts and tallies the votes using the reconstructed private key.

      This method requires a threshold number of key shares to reconstruct the private key before decryption can occur.

      Parameters:
      encryptedVotes - The list of encrypted votes to tally
      shares - The list of key shares for private key reconstruction

    • publishResults

      public void publishResults()
      Publishes the election results.

      Generates a formatted report of the election results including the number of votes for each candidate.

    • getPublicKey

      public PublicKey getPublicKey()
      Gets the public key for the Tallying Authority.
      Returns:
      The public key

    • getKeyShares

      public List<KeyShare> getKeyShares()
      Gets all key shares.
      Returns:
      List of key shares

    • getResults

      public Map<String,Integer> getResults()
      Gets the election results.
      Returns:
      A map containing candidates and their vote counts
